error.secondary: This server does not support this type of authentication and may not support authentication at all.

error.primary: Your login to your server "{0}" as "{0}" failed.
error.secondary: Check to make sure your password is spelled correctly. Remember that many passwords are case sensitive; your caps lock might be on.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to send a message in HTML format?
Are you sure you want to send a message without a subject?
error.secondary: Adding a meaningful Subject line to your messages will give your recipients an idea of what your mail is about.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to send a message with only BCC recipients?
error.secondary:
The contact list you are sending to is configured to hide list recipients.
Many email systems add an Apparently-To header to messages that only have BCC recipients. This header, if added, will list all of your recipients in your message. To avoid this, you should add at least one To: or CC: recipient.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to send a message with only BCC recipients?
error.secondary: Many email systems add an Apparently-To header to messages that only have BCC recipients. This header, if added, will list all of your recipients to your message anyway. To avoid this, you should add at least one To: or CC: recipient.

error.primary: This message cannot be sent because you have not specified any Recipients
error.secondary: Please enter a valid email address in the To: field. You can search for email addresses by clicking on the To: button next to the entry box.
Unable to open the drafts folder for this account. Use the system drafts folder instead?

error.primary: Are you sure you want to permanently remove all the deleted message in folder "{0}"?
error.secondary: If you continue, you will not be able to recover these messages.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to permanently remove all the deleted messages in all folders?
error.secondary: If you continue, you will not be able to recover these messages.

error.primary: You have unsent messages, do you wish to quit anyway?
error.secondary: If you quit, these messages will not be sent until Evolution is started again.

error.primary: Your message with the subject "{0}" was not delivered.
error.secondary: The message was sent via the "sendmail" external application. Sendmail reports the following error: status 67: mail not sent. The message is stored in the Outbox folder. Check the message for errors and resend.
